cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokyuu

sentence.kanji: ゆっくり呼吸してください。
sentence.romaji: yukuri kokyuu shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please breathe slowly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's byoudou

sentence.kanji: あの先生は生徒をみな平等に扱います。
sentence.romaji: ano sensei ha seito wo mina byoudou ni atsukaimasu
sentence.english: That teacher treats all students equally.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiratai

sentence.kanji: 平たいお皿を一枚取って。
sentence.romaji: hiratai osara wo ichimai tote
sentence.english: Can you hand me a plate?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakeru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は昨日から私のことを避けているようなんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kinou kara watashi no koto wo sakete iru you nan da
sentence.english: She seems to have been avoiding me since yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kekaku

sentence.kanji: 昔は結核でたくさんの人が亡くなった。
sentence.romaji: mukashi ha kekaku de takusan no hito ga nakunata
sentence.english: In the past, a lot of people died of tuberculosis.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bijutsu

sentence.kanji: 弟は美術を専攻しています。
sentence.romaji: otouto ha bijutsu wo senkou shite imasu
sentence.english: My little brother majors in fine art.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaku

sentence.kanji: 核戦争は絶対に防ぐべきよ。
sentence.romaji: kakusensou ha zetai ni fusegu beki yo
sentence.english: Nuclear war should be avoided at all costs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikioi

sentence.kanji: そのチームには勢いがありますね。
sentence.romaji: sono chi-mu ni ha ikioi ga arimasu ne
sentence.english: That team has momentum.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suihei

sentence.kanji: この棚は水平になっていませんね。
sentence.romaji: kono tana ha suihei ni nate imasen ne
sentence.english: This shelf is not horizontal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuzuru

sentence.kanji: 上司が車を譲ってくれたの。
sentence.romaji: joushi ga kuruma wo yuzute kureta no
sentence.english: My boss gave me his car.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nibui

sentence.kanji: 今日は頭の回転が鈍いです。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha atama no kaiten ga nibui desu
sentence.english: My brain is working slowly today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's donkan

sentence.kanji: あの人は少し鈍感だと思います。
sentence.romaji: ano hito ha sukoshi donkan da to omoimasu
sentence.english: That person is a bit thickheaded I think.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakebi

sentence.kanji: 彼女の心の叫びに誰も気付かなかったよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no kokoro no sakebi ni dare mo kizukanakata yo
sentence.english: No one noticed her cry from the heart.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakebu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は助けを求めて大声で叫んだの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha tasuke wo motomete oogoe de sakenda no
sentence.english: She cried out for help.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oka

sentence.kanji: 私たちは舟を降りて、陸に上がったんだ。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha fune wo orite oka ni agata n da
sentence.english: We got out of the boat and stepped onto shore.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinsen

sentence.kanji: この店では新鮮な野菜が買えますよ。
sentence.romaji: kono mise de ha shinsen na yasai ga kaemasu yo
sentence.english: You can buy fresh vegetables at this shop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heibon

sentence.kanji: 彼はごく平凡な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha goku heibon na hito desu
sentence.english: He's a very ordinary person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinrui

sentence.kanji: 彼は幼い時に親類に預けられたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha osanai toki ni shinrui ni azukerareta n da
sentence.english: He was put under his relatives' care when he was small.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yobikakeru

sentence.kanji: 友人達に協力を呼び掛けたの。
sentence.romaji: yuujintachi ni kyouryoku wo yobikaketa no
sentence.english: I asked some friends for their cooperation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's karai

sentence.kanji: 部長は僕の仕事に辛い評価を出したんだ。
sentence.romaji: buchou ha boku no shigoto ni karai hyouka wo dashita n da
sentence.english: My manager was very critical in his evaluation of my work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuhei

sentence.kanji: 私はいつも同僚の不平を聞いているんだ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha itsumo douryou no fuhei wo kiite iru n da
sentence.english: I'm always hearing my colleague's complaints.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oyayubi

sentence.kanji: 親指を怪我しました。
sentence.romaji: oyayubi wo kegashimashita
sentence.english: I injured my thumb.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuukaku

sentence.kanji: お米の収穫が始まったね。
sentence.romaji: okome no shuukaku ga hajimata ne
sentence.english: The rice harvest has started.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iyashii

sentence.kanji: 彼は金に卑しいね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kane ni iyashii ne
sentence.english: He's greedy for money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seiryoku

sentence.kanji: この頃は、ローマが勢力を伸ばしていました。
sentence.romaji: kono koro ha ro-ma ga seiryoku wo nobashite imashita
sentence.english: At that time Rome was expanding its power.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinseki

sentence.kanji: 祖父の家に親戚が集まったんだ。
sentence.romaji: sofu no ie ni shinseki ga atsumata n da
sentence.english: Relatives gathered at my grandfather's house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houshuu

sentence.kanji: その仕事の報酬として20万円もらいました。
sentence.romaji: sono shigoto no houshuu to shite 20 manen moraimashita
sentence.english: I was remunerated 200,000 yen for this work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kizamu

sentence.kanji: 玉ねぎを細かく刻んでください。
sentence.romaji: tamanegi wo komakaku kizande kudasai
sentence.english: Please chop the onion finely.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinzen

sentence.kanji: これからも両国の親善を深めましょう。
sentence.romaji: korekara mo ryoukoku no shinzen wo fukamemashou
sentence.english: Let's continue promoting friendship between our two countries from now on.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saiwai

sentence.kanji: 幸い、電車に嵐の影響はなかった。
sentence.romaji: saiwai densha ni arashi no eikyou ha nakata
sentence.english: Fortunately, the train was not affected by the storm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ojousan

sentence.kanji: 彼はお嬢さんと一緒でした。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ojousan to isho deshita
sentence.english: He was with his daughter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fusagu

sentence.kanji: あまりにうるさかったので耳を塞いだわ。
sentence.romaji: amarini urusakata no de mimi wo fusaida wa
sentence.english: I blocked my ears as it was too noisy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oyako

sentence.kanji: 池に鴨の親子がいます。
sentence.romaji: ike ni kamo no oyako ga imasu
sentence.english: A mother duck and her ducklings are in the pond.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hareru

sentence.kanji: 明日は晴れるといいですね。
sentence.romaji: ashita ha hareru to ii desu ne
sentence.english: I hope it'll be sunny tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanji

sentence.kanji: 漢字は中国から来ました。
sentence.romaji: kanji ha chuugoku kara kimashita
sentence.english: Kanji came from China.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haru

sentence.kanji: 今年の春は暖かいね。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi no haru ha atatakai ne
sentence.english: It's warm this spring, isn't it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sensei

sentence.kanji: 私は日本語の先生になりたいです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha nihongo no sensei ni naritai desu
sentence.english: I want to become a Japanese teacher.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muzukashii

sentence.kanji: この本は難しいですね。
sentence.romaji: kono hon ha muzukashii desu ne
sentence.english: This book is difficult.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noru

sentence.kanji: 駅からはタクシーに乗ってください。
sentence.romaji: eki karaha takushi- ni note kudasai
sentence.english: Please take a taxi from the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daigakusei

sentence.kanji: 姉は大学生です。
sentence.romaji: ane ha daigakusei desu
sentence.english: My big sister's a college student.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukousei

sentence.kanji: 私の弟は高校生です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no otouto ha koukousei desu
sentence.english: My little brother's a high school student.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakusei

sentence.kanji: 彼は真面目な学生です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha majime na gakusei desu
sentence.english: He's a serious student.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryuugakusei

sentence.kanji: 彼は留学生です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ryuugakusei desu
sentence.english: He's a foreign student.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikiru

sentence.kanji: 皆一生懸命生きている。
sentence.romaji: minna ishoukenmei ikite iru
sentence.english: They're all living their lives the best way that they can.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aoi

sentence.kanji: ここの海はとても青い。
sentence.romaji: koko no umi ha totemo aoi
sentence.english: The sea here is very blue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hare

sentence.kanji: 明日の天気は晴れです。
sentence.romaji: asu no tenki ha hare desu
sentence.english: Tomorrow's weather will be sunny.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jijou

sentence.kanji: あなたの事情はよく分かりました。
sentence.romaji: anata no jijou ha yoku wakarimashita
sentence.english: I understand your situation well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's josei

sentence.kanji: そのパーティーに女性は何人来ますか。
sentence.romaji: sono pa-tei- ni josei ha nannin kimasu ka
sentence.english: How many women are coming to that party?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seisan

sentence.kanji: ボルドーはワインの生産で有名だ。
sentence.romaji: borudo- ha wain no seisan de yuumei da
sentence.english: Bordeau is famous for wine production.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seito

sentence.kanji: このクラスの生徒は30人です。
sentence.romaji: kono kurasu no seito ha sanjuunin desu
sentence.english: There are 30 students in this class.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's warizan

sentence.kanji: 割り算は小学校で習います。
sentence.romaji: warizan ha shougakou de naraimasu
sentence.english: Division is learned in elementary school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jishi

sentence.kanji: 現在、スペシャルキャンペーンを実施中です。
sentence.romaji: genzai supesharukyanpe-n wo jishichuu desu
sentence.english: A special campaign is now under way.
